title: SMS Spam Filter Pro v1.0.7 android
description:
Requirements: 2.2 and up.

Overview: Allow / block the sender, supported phone numbers, numbers range, contacts and all contacts at once.

Features:
- a large set of filters.
- 5 modes for analyzing triggered filters.
- possibility to check the filters writing test SMS (without sending).
- export filters to a file.
- suspicious SMS popup.
- led light when SMS was blocked or showing suspicious SMS popup.

Filters:
- allow / block the sender, supported phone numbers, numbers range, contacts and all contacts at once.
- allow / block content word.
- allow / block time of receiving SMS.
Extended blocks:
- detecting similar letters from different languages, this trick used to bypass content word filtering.
- detecting URLs in the text.
- detecting phone number in text.
- check that the sender was a phone number instead of text.
Tags: black list, call filter, sms manager, sms filter, spam killer, blacklist, sms blocker, SMS spam blocke, text blocker, sms guard, anti sms spam, call blocker, mobile security, spam blocker, no spam

What's New:
v1.0.7:
- fixed bug when SMS not deleted from logs after moving to inbox.
- constant monitoring of priority receiving SMS, can be disabled in the preferences.
- improved urls searching.
v1.0.6:
- added checking priority for receiving SMS
v1.0.5:
- improved search for content word, urls and phone numbers
- improvement in usability

This app has no advertisements

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=singulapps.smsfilter.pro" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
